about_the_game:
What is the "Cosmetic Pass" ?

The Cosmetic Pass is an optional DLC that allows players access to the cosmetics that the game provides. These items are all for shows and have no gameplay advantage against others.

What's included

There are 24 Turtle Toppers (10 are re-colors) and 18 Weapon Wraps included. These items are unlocked by just playing games and can be disabled by the player while in the main menu.

The Items

A "Turtle Topper" is a 3D cosmetic that sits on the shell of your Turtle character. This is not visible to you while playing but other players can see it on your back.




A "Weapon Wrap" is a texture wrap that goes over your weapon to give it a different look. This is visible to both you and the other players.

Previews

These previews were made for the first version of the Cosmetic Pass, some changes may have been made and new items have been added since.
Weapon Wraps:
Turtle Toppers:
(steam links no longer work in store pages. Please use the links on the right side of the page where it says "Visit the Website")

How to unlock:

Below are the cosmetics and how many games you need to play in order to unlock them.

Weapon Wraps:

Carbon Steel - 0 (Pass not required)
Galvanized Steel - 2 (Pass not required)
Glitter - 4
Space - 7
Sapphire - 10
Green Marble -15 (Pass not required)
Pure Steel -20
Lightning - 25
Tigers Eye - 30
Blue Sky - 35
Jade - 40
Brick - 45
Baked Beans - 50
Flower Petals - 55
Scratched Gold - 60
Snow - 65
Matte Blue - 70 (Pass not required)
Amethyst - 75
The Void - 80
Silk - 85
White Marble - 90
Perfect Gold - 95

Turtle Toppers

Bread - 0
Moldy Bread - 1 (Pass not required)
Guinea Pig "Peanut" - 3
Guinea Pig "Missy" - 3
Crab - 6
Cheese - 12 (Pass not required)
Blue Cheese - 12
Pumpkin - 18 (Pass not required)
Microwave - 24
Red Bird - 30
Pink Bird - 30
Green Bird - 30
Landmine - 36
Fridge - 42
Chicken Bucket - 48
Flower Purple - 54 (Pass not required)
Flower Pink - 54
Flower Light Blue - 54
Flower Dark Blue - 54
Piggy Bank - 60
Pylon - 66
Martini Glass - 72
Wizard Hat Blue - 78
Wizard Hat Black - 78
Wizard Hat Purple - 78
Nuclear Weapon - 84
Stop Sign - 90
Homemade Pizza Oven - 96

name: Turtle Champs - Cosmetics Pass
short_description: The Cosmetic Pass includes 10 Weapon Wraps and 8 Turtle Toppers to mix and match on your character while you play.
